Html:
When I import my character into Tankadin from armory, it is saying that my block chance is high enough to never be hit. Initially I thought rawr might be assuming that redoubt is always up but even when I removed all my talents it said I was still un-hittable.

Since then I have played around with tankadin starting with no gear or talents. As I start adding equipment, the values seem fine. However, as I add more items there will be a point where the block chance will suddenly jump to being maxed. Sometimes this can happen after only two items are added (just boots and legs when I did it) and I don't even have a shield equiped.

Yes, there are a few minor things incorrect with the protadin module.

I have submitted a ticket for some of them already.

http://www.codeplex.com/Rawr/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=11989
Short version, Block Rating is incorrectly giving 100x what it should and will be fixed. Long version, read the link fuseflower posted.
